name: Bridge and Switch, LLC.
description:
Bridge and Switch began on the premise that data-driven businesses require both engineering excellence and developer advocacy to innovate and get more value from product work streams.
Having gained experience in operations and search engineering challenges at the world’s largest search engine at Google, our expertise range from web development, analytics, search marketing strategy, and developer relations, we advocate for tech inclusion and open data initiatives to ensure that AI technologies benefit, empower and protect as many people as possible.
